menu.button(text, x, y, w, h, ic, ac, surface)¶

Creates button and returns False if clicked and True if not clicked :param str text: text to display on the button :param int x: x parameter of button’s localization :param int y: y parameter of button’s localization :param int w: width of the button :param int h: height of the button :param ic: inactive color of the button :param ac: active color of the button :param surface: surface for the button to be displayed on

Displays text on screen. :param str text: text to display :param surface: surface for the text to be displayed on :param font_size: font size of the text :param color: color of the text :param localization: localization of the text
